EmailTemplate.name: Q2 Wake The Dead.Send 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Become A Datacenter Zombie
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/GreenDataCenter.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wakethedead&utm_content=061615> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, We haven't heard from you in a while, and we're starting to think that something terrible may have happened. Please let us know that you haven't...turned.
Zombie VMs are taking over and it was only a matter of time until those in the datacenter became infected. Fear not though, for there is a cure. VMTurbo is here to stop these Zombie VMs in there tracks; increasing efficiency, reducing latency and overall saving the world.
Find out how in the report below. <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/GreenDataCenter.pdf> If its too late and there truly is no hope then you can unsubscribe here <http://go.vmturbo.com/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_unsubscribe>.
